properties.name: dolly.texas.preload
properties.description: If true, will attempt to preload (and cache) tokens for all configured consumers on startup.

properties.name: dolly.texas.url.token
properties.description: Override the default token URL (NAIS_TOKEN_ENDPOINT) for Texas. Useful when testing locally to point to the Texas proxy.

properties.name: dolly.texas.url.exchange
properties.description: Override the default exchange URL (NAIS_TOKEN_EXCHANGE_ENDPOINT) for Texas. Useful when testing locally to point to the Texas proxy.

properties.name: dolly.texas.url.introspect
properties.description: Override the default token introspection URL (NAIS_TOKEN_INTROSPECTION_ENDPOINT) for Texas. Useful when testing locally to point to the Texas proxy.

properties.name: dolly.texas.local.secret
properties.description: A common secret shared with texas-proxy, for running applications locally. As a backup, the environment variable DOLLY_TEXAS_PROXY_SHARED_SECRET will be used instead, before defaulting to null (as when running in a pod).
